message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Is that something you'd be willing to sell it to me for?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not sure I can go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about we discuss $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $85?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $100? That's the lowest I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $90?
